text.value: Select the feature you wish to map.
You can collect up to 10 points for infrastructure lines.
How far away is the feature from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the feature.
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
How far away is the second point from you (m)?
Collect the bearing of the second feature?
Do you wish to collect a sample?
Do you wish to complete the sample questionnaire?
To aid in the identification of the flora species complete the following steps.
Select the species growth habit (i.e. form).
Does it have a tuber or rhizome?
Describe the leaf characteristics (arrangement, size, shape, margin, colour.
Enter the colour of the flower.
Photograph the seed or seed pod.
Does the specimen have hairs of prickles.
Where are the hairs or prickles located?
Describe the Sap or Latex when a leaf or stem is broken off.
Take a photo of the specimen in a sealed sample bag.
Do you wish to take a second sample?
Take a photo of the feature.
Do you wish to take a third sample?
Take a photo of the feature.
Select the types of erosion present
What is the erosion severity for scalding?
What is the erosion stability for scalding?
What is the erosion severity for wind sheeting?
What is the erosion stability for wind sheeting?
What is the erosion severity for water sheeting?
What is the erosion stability for water sheeting?
What is the erosion severity for rilling?
What is the erosion stability for rilling?
What is the erosion severity for gullying?
What is the erosion stability for gullying?
Is the clearing new or historic?
Is the clearing selective or full felling?
Enter the botanical woody thickening species
Enter the common woody thickening species
Select one or multiple feral animals.
Enter any other feral species not in list.
Is the feature within the cadastre boundary?
Select the condition of the feature.
Enter full label to be displayed on map

bind.relevant: not(selected( /data/INFRA/LINE_OBJ ,'fence') or selected( /data/INFRA/LINE_OBJ , 'water_pipeline') or selected( /data/INFRA/WAT_OBJ , 'trough') or selected( /data/INFRA/WAT_OBJ , 'gate'))

selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'grass') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'herb') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'vine') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'aquatic') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'succulent')

selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'tree') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'shrub') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'vine') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'grass') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'herb') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'vine') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'aquatic') or selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'succulent')

not(selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'grass')) and not(selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_OTHER/ODOUR , 'no_odour')) or not(selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_HABIT/GROW_HABIT , 'grass')) and not(selected( /data/PLANT_COLLECTING/PLANT_ID/PLANT_OTHER/ODOUR , 'no_odour'))

selected( /data/INFRA/PNT_OBJ ,'landing_ground') or selected( /data/INFRA/PNT_OBJ ,'general_building') or selected( /data/INFRA/PNT_OBJ ,'homestead') or selected( /data/INFRA/PNT_OBJ ,'monitoring_site')

selected( /data/GROUP_FEATURE/FEATURE ,'infrastructure') and not(selected( /data/INFRA/LINE_OBJ ,'fence')) or selected( /data/GROUP_FEATURE/FEATURE ,'infrastructure') and not(selected( /data/INFRA/PNT_OBJ ,'gate'))

upload.hint: Swipe left if you do not require to take a photo.

select1.hint: To stop entering species swipe left OR select 'End selection'. NOTE: Scroll down to enter weed distribution and density.

input.hint: Use the following image to estimate density.

select1.hint: The amount of weeds identified within the previously identified area.

input.hint: Photograph AND / OR fill in field note sections, and collect a sample if required.

upload.hint: Include a ruler or pencil into the photo for scale where possible.

input.hint: Colour and extent of the bark and whether it is rough or smooth, are there spines present?

upload.hint: Include a ruler or pencil into the photo for scale where possible.

input.hint: Colour of inner bark when cut
Some of these features can change upon drying but may be diagnostic when fresh so noting these features can be important.
